recipe_name: Curried lamb steak on sweet potato rosti
author: Brian Turner
method: For the curried lamb steak, drizzle the lamb steak with olive oil and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Mix all the spices together in a small bowl, then dredge the lamb in the spices to coat. Heat a griddle pan and chargrill the lamb for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until cooked to your liking. Remove from the pan and set aside to rest in a warm place. For the rösti, place the grated sweet potato onto a clean tea towel and squeeze out the excess moisture. Place the sweet potato into a bowl with the apple and half of the butter, season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well. Heat the remaining butter and the oil in a small non-stick frying pan and press the sweet potato mixture into the base of the pan. Fry for 4-6 minutes on each side, or until crisp and golden-brown. To serve, place the rösti onto a serving plate and top with the curried lamb steak.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz lamb steak,  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  ¼ tsp ground cinnamon,  ¼ tsp chilli powder,  ¼ tsp ground ginger,  ¼ tsp ground turmeric,  ¼ tsp ground mixed spice,  100g/3½oz sweet potato, peeled and grated ,  ½ apple, grated,  55g/2oz butter,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  1 tbsp olive oil
